member.name: T:GuessingGameForm.GuessForm
member.summary: Partial class that holds the view for the guess form. Contains inputs for upper and lower bound of range and allows user to guess random number.

member.name: F:GuessingGameForm.GuessForm.gameLogic
member.summary: Generates a random number in a range that the user will try to guess.

member.name: M:GuessingGameForm.GuessForm.#ctor
member.summary: Constructor that will initialize the form to play the guessing game.

member.name: M:GuessingGameForm.GuessForm.BtnStart_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the user clicks the start button, the user's upper and lower bounds are used to generate a random number. The form elements to guess the random number are then enabled.

member.name: M:GuessingGameForm.GuessForm.BtnGuess_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the user clicks the guess button, the user's guess is taken from the text box and compared with the random number that was generated by gameLogic. The user is either correct and the game ends, or incorrect and they can continue entering guesses.

member.name: M:GuessingGameForm.GuessForm.BtnSetDefaults_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: Shows the form to specify default ranges for user.

member.name: F:GuessingGameForm.GuessForm.components
member.summary: Required designer variable.

member.name: M:GuessingGameForm.GuessForm.Dispose(System.Boolean)
member.summary: Clean up any resources being used.
member.param: true if managed resources should be disposed; otherwise, false.

member.summary: Required method for Designer support - do not modify the contents of this method with the code editor.

member.name: T:GuessingGameForm.Program
member.summary: Entry point for the guessing game.

member.name: M:GuessingGameForm.Program.Main
member.summary: The main entry point for the application.

member.name: T:GuessingGameForm.UserSpecificSettings
member.summary: Form for user to specify the lower and upper bounds for their game.

member.name: M:GuessingGameForm.UserSpecificSettings.#ctor
member.summary: Shows the form to change default bounds.

member.name: M:GuessingGameForm.UserSpecificSettings.btnDefaults_Click(System.Object,System.EventArgs)
member.summary: When the set default button is clicked, the user's upper and lower bounds will be changed. The upper and lower bounds must be valid, otherwise they will remain unchanged.
